paramInformation.label: Siren Strobe Mode
paramInformation.description: Defines the reaction of the siren

paramInformation.label: Alarm Auto Stop Time
paramInformation.description: Defines the auto time out of the alarm indication

metadata.inclusion: Touch the magnet of the bracket to the reed switch and separate immediately. The LED should go off after successful inclusion or flash if not included.
metadata.exclusion: Touch the magnet of the bracket to the reed switch and separate immediately. LED will flash continuously during exclusion.
metadata.reset: Device resets to factory defaults when excluded.
